commenter_a: These are 2 polls of manyyyyyyy. These were outlier polls. The AP is a 14 pt spread in favor of Hillary. If they don't make this look like a horse race the last week or so, people won't watch. Nate Silver pointed this out last night. Go check out 538 polls. Imagine 100s of weather models predicting a snow storm predominately tracking east and 1 or 2 suddenly say west. Those are outliers and not a reflection of the whole. People are in here all excited bc they don't know what they are looking at.
